Title: Establishes a fuel cell incentive program
Summary: Establishes a fuel cell incentive program to be managed by NYSERDA to encourage development of fuel cell generating systems.
LawCode: Add §66-q, Pub Serv L; ren §1020-ll to be §1020-zz, §§1020-jj, 1020-kk & 1020-ll to be §§1020-ww, 1020-xx & 1020-yy, add §1020-jj, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law and the public authorities law, in relation to establishing a fuel cell incentive program
